mapper.select:
select task.id, task.name, task.description, task.creator, task.project, task.plugin_id, task.schedule_interval, task.schedule_unit, task.status, task.plugin_config, task.utc_create_time createTime from task
task.is_deleted = false
and task.name ilike ('%' || #{request.name} || '%')
and task.creator ilike ('%' || #{request.creator} || '%')
and task.project ilike ('%' || #{request.project} || '%')
and task.pluginId = #{request.pluginId}
order by task.utc_create_time desc
select id from task where name = #{name} order by task.utc_create_time desc limit 1
